website_summaries.verdict: The gym-friendly JLab Epic Sport Wireless earphones offer solid audio with variable EQ modes and a very secure fit.
pros: Strong audio performance with full bass response and three EQ settings
cons: Easy to skip tracks by accident
Sculpted sound signature not for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage or defective?
customer_reviews.text: I want to start by saying I loved my jlab sport 2s, But they recently died so I bought these as a replacement and presumably an upgrade. However, they do not have the 12 hour battery life as advertised, they have died about every other day mid workout, and today won’t even turn on despite being charged. The second issue, while the new charging connection is cool and probably more water resistant, why is the cord like 6 inches??? If I now need a new charger option that unique to these headphones please make it a usable length. Over all wish I just bought the jlab 2s again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Fernicola

customer_reviews.title: I would like my refund or be sent a new pair as ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit is hard to figure out and these stoped working only less than a month from purchase. They simply won’t recharge and I have tried multiple different ports and plug ins. I would like my refund or be sent a new pair as I loved them when they were working.
customer_reviews.author: Hanan atwi

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and sweatproof
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that even with 5 options, I still couldn’t really find a size that fit my ears. It took a lot of trial and errror to find one suitable. Also the bendable wire doesn’t stay bent as long as I would like it to. But overall I do think it was a good purchase, the sound quality is pretty good, Bluetooth is great, and battery life is awesome. I sweat a lot and after a couple months it seems to be holding up.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Melted while charging
customer_reviews.text: One of the best wireless headphones that I've had as far as battery life, sound, and comfort. But melted while charging after only four months. It also just so happens that the product support window closed 25 days ago too. I'm going to contact JLAB to see if they will replace the unit and I'll update the review depending on what they say.
customer_reviews.author: Mer-Z Mars

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Although these earbuds had good audio quality and connectivity and functioned well at the beginning, after 6 months the battery would no longer hold a charge making them virtually useless. At this price, they should certainly last longer than that. I'm throwing them out and buying new earbuds from another company. I bought them based on a Wirecutter recommendation which has now been withdrawn because of the poor quality and reliability of these earbuds. Don't make the same mistake I did. Spend your money on other earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Clif

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound, stays put
customer_reviews.text: I've spent a lot of time and money on bluetooth earbuds, and returned all except these due to a poor fit. Try as I might, I have not been able to get these to pop out of either ear. The sound quality is excellent and I don't say that cavalierly - I LOVE music of all kinds and truly appreciate quality sound. I was hesitant to buy due to the purchase price but I'm very, very happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Rolo

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, battery doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought these several months ago to use at the gym. I have really tiny ears, but wanted decent sound quality. The sound on these is okay, but switching to the smallest ear plugs significantly diminishes the sound quality. Not only that, but these are extremely uncomfortable and I've stopped using them all together. After 5-10 minutes in, my ears start hurting because they don't fit. They are overall too big. I wish I could return them but I'm outside of the window. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ArtfulApricot

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity issues, and earbuds don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: Constant bluetooth connection issues cause music cutouts, I called support and they just told me to re-connect which doesn't fix anything. Also even with multiple earbud sizes included, none of them fit well, they all slip out of my ear after a few minutes, even with little to no movement. My previous sports headphones would stay put for hours, with any kind of exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Alastair

customer_reviews.title: Audio "skips" throughout playback.  A lot.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like I'm not the only one led to this product by Wirecutter. Wish I had waited until they REMOVED their review due to problems... I experience dozens of audio skips per track I play while using these headphones. These skips or tiny gaps won't remedy themselves no matter how many times I repair the headphones. Seems like a fundamental flaw. I've submitted for a warranty claim, but avoid my fate and pick another set of workout earbuds...
customer_reviews.author: Greglorious

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: Best sound I've found yet for under $100. Very good quality in design as well.
customer_reviews.author: IL Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. It took little adjusting but it fits ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It took little adjusting but it fits well and do sent fall out. I think the sound could be better but overall I'm happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Battery is no good after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: It was a good product until 1 year later when it would hold no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Stetson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! Easy to use. Great customer service. I cut through one of the wires while unpacking and they sent me a new one without question.
customer_reviews.author: Sassybash

customer_reviews.title: No dice after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Quit working. As unreliable as all Bluetooth headphones generally are (Powerbeats3, Jaybirds, etc.) This has to be some sort of scam to keep consumers in line for more trash.
customer_reviews.author: pagesinvented

customer_reviews.title: They just stop working
customer_reviews.text: These were my second pair of Jlab earbuds and both lasted about 6 months until they just stopped charging. I like the sound and secure fit but this is terrible hardware, especially at this price point, and Jlab support is absent.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Short Life Expectancy
customer_reviews.text: Second pair and again within less than a year they fail. Not charging. As a category none of these wireless exercise headsets seem to last. Having said that the sound quality, comfort and battery life of these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Iain Smith

customer_reviews.title: The sound and battery life are great. I sweat a lot when I work out ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound and battery life are great. I sweat a lot when I work out and these keep up with me. Also, I received great service when I inquired about purchasing a replacement charger. I see the microphone is a big complaint on here, but I've never had anyone on the other end of a call complain.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Marshall

customer_reviews.title: the quality of sound is satisfied, although bass isn't good as XB50BS
customer_reviews.text: Compared with another 3 earbuds I used (Sony XB50BS, Jabra STEP, Beats X), the quality of sound is satisfied, although bass isn't good as XB50BS. Indeed. it's bulky in terms of size, but the weight is pretty acceptable. Memory earhook is easy to loosen, so I have to adjust it almost every time.
customer_reviews.author: Dukefc0102

customer_reviews.title: Charge did not hold.
customer_reviews.text: Were very comfortable, but charge did NOT hold! Very frustrating as they would constantly die after 1 workout session(90 minutes), turn off product.. then would not turn back on or would die within 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S.

customer_reviews.title: On second pair, still won't charge
customer_reviews.text: The headphones can have an awkward fit which negatively impacts volume but the bigger issue is charging breaks regularly. I'm in my second pair and they won't charge.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Short

customer_reviews.title: Work well on drum and bass songs
customer_reviews.text: 。Sound quality: ---Drum and bass 8.5/10 ---mid and high 6.5/10 。Finishing quality 7/10 。Battery life 9/10 。Battery charger design 9/10 。Convenient 8/10 Comforting7/10 *The soft case is quite small for this earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Tong Lok Ting

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Worst headphones I’ve ever purchased. My husband and I tried all the different ear peices but the headphones will not stay in our ears. Do not buy these. I had to keep readjusting every two seconds during a workout
customer_reviews.author: harnoor

customer_reviews.title: The best version yet!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, I have a pair from a previous generation. These are an incredible improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip L.

customer_reviews.title: Battery Bad
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for about 18 months and then they died. They won’t hold a charge anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for exercising - getting nothing but a constant broken bluetooth connection. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Case

customer_reviews.title: Fails to Charge; Hassle to Replace
customer_reviews.text: Just want to echo what others have said. I had these about a month before they stopped charging altogether. This is not a problem that $100 dollar headphones should have.
customer_reviews.author: Finn Thorsell

customer_reviews.title: Right headphone stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After less than 4 months, the rights headphone is projecting far less sound than the left. These headphones were a terrible investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't seem to get them to stay in my ear ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't seem to get them to stay in my ear no matter what configuration. They just squeeze right out. The audio quality is decent while they're in.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hilmo

customer_reviews.title: Battery is below average
customer_reviews.text: Product is average. Doesn't hold battery when I charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Betson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good. I like it. The connect around is about 15m.
customer_reviews.author: singwei

customer_reviews.title: Not sure where the 100$ went, but it wasn't sound.
customer_reviews.text: Notice how the "verified" purchases give these fewer stars? That's not a coincidence. These are poorly implemented. The shape of them comes undone all too quicky, the proprietary charger is fail, and they sounded no better than a pair of 20$ sony cheapies I have. Until a bluetooth set can match that simple comparison, I see no need to keep a set costing 100$. Overpriced, overhyped, underthought. Avoid. These are getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: HeHatesTheseCans

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction and poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Construction felt cheap, particularly the button controller and the proprietary charging cable. Could not get a good fit in my ears despite all combinations of the included earpieces and probably as a result, the different sound settings resulted in "okay," "tinny," and "shrill." The bluetooth worked well, however, so two stars. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: mfs485

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection is not really good, but the product is good in other aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, bad charger
customer_reviews.text: Good set of headphones. Sound great and the fit is excellent. I own their epic 2 and have no complaints. The problem here and reason for only 3 stars is the proprietary charging cable. I know this is to improve sweat and water resistance but no one wants to have to worry about another cable. I'll be sticking with my epic 2s for this reason until true wireless buds get better.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bossi

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit, terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: Bad fit, terrible sound. I put these things in and in but a moment could tell I made a mistake. Sound was muddy and the fit was wonky. My 20 dollar anker earbuds sound and feel better. The search for a real upgrade to them continues...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: JLab Audio Epic Sport Wireless Earbuds - Black - Active Lifestyle 12 Hour Battery Life Bluetooth 4.2 with aptX Technology IP66 Sweatproof Built In Microphones for Phone Calls Extra Gel Tips +Cush Fins
product_meta.description:
GO Play.

The Epic Sport Wireless Earbuds won't let you slow down. The 12-hour battery life keep you GOing from game to game, activity to activity. Its IP66 rating will protect them from all of your sweaty hobbies. The secure Memory Wire and multiple eartips provide endless all-day comfort.

Get ready to GO.

Longest Playtime

The longest battery life in the game with an outstanding 12-hour playtime, the Epic Sport will power through every workout. Recharge when needed with a magnetic USB cable.

Custom EQ³ Sound

Tune the Epic Sport sound to your personal preferences with Signature, Balanced, and Bass Boost modes – without an app. The Epic Sport delivers upgraded crystal-clear sound, giving you clear skip-free music with 8mm drivers in a small housing.

Fitness-Approved

An IP66 sweatproof and moisture rating lets you sweat through workouts.

Secure Fit

The Memory Wire earhook and compact earbud with six tip options, keeps the Epic Sport securely in place while you run, jump, and play.

Bluetooth 4.2

Enjoy wireless freedom with Bluetooth 4.2 with aptX. From up to 30 feet away from your device you can control all your music with the in-line remote; play, pause, skip tracks, change volume, and answer and hang up phone calls while you GO.
feature_bullets: 12 Hour Bluetooth Playtime, Magnetic USB Charging Cable included
IP66 Sweatproof, Bluetooth 4.2 with aptX technology, Built In Microphones for Phone Calls
4 Sets Standard Gel Eartips (XS, S, M, L), 1 Set Triple Flange Eartips (M), 3 Cush Fins
One Year Warranty and expert support incuded!
